obj-attribute.name: initiatorId
obj-attribute.note: ИД инициатора (либо Пользователь B2B, либо Пользователь личного кабинета)

obj-attribute.name: initiatorTypeId
obj-attribute.note: Тип инициатора (1 - Пользователь B2B, 2 - Пользователь личного кабинета, 3 - Отправитель с сайта)

query.name: dsPaAppealBrowseListByParam
query.sql: SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.APPEALDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'APPEALDATE'), #result('T.APPEALNUMBER', 'java.lang.String', 'APPEALNUMBER'), #result('T.APPEALOBJECTID', 'java.lang.Long', 'APPEALOBJECTID'), #result('T.CATEGORYID', 'java.lang.Long', 'CATEGORYID'), #result('T.CONTRID', 'java.lang.Long', 'CONTRID'), #result('T.APPEALID', 'java.lang.Long', 'APPEALID'), #result('T.INITIATOREMAIL', 'java.lang.String', 'INITIATOREMAIL'), #result('T.INITIATORID', 'java.lang.Long', 'INITIATORID'), #result('T.INITIATORNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'INITIATORNAME'), #result('T.INITIATORPHONE', 'java.lang.String', 'INITIATORPHONE'), #result('T.INITIATORSURNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'INITIATORSURNAME'), #result('T.INITIATORTYPEID', 'java.lang.Long', 'INITIATORTYPEID'), #result('T.SOURCEID', 'java.lang.Long', 'SOURCEID'), #result('T.STATUSNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'STATUSNAME'), #result('T.STATUSSYSNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'STATUSSYSNAME') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_APPEAL T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALDATE) T.APPEALDATE = #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($APPEALNUMBER) T.APPEALNUMBER = #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($APPEALOBJECTID) T.APPEALOBJECTID = #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CATEGORYID) T.CATEGORYID = #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRID) T.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATOREMAIL) T.INITIATOREMAIL = #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORID) T.INITIATORID = #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATORNAME) T.INITIATORNAME = #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORPHONE) T.INITIATORPHONE = #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORSURNAME) T.INITIATORSURNAME = #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORTYPEID) T.INITIATORTYPEID = #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($SOURCEID) T.SOURCEID = #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSNAME) T.STATUSNAME = #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) T.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaAppealBrowseListByParamCount
query.sql: SELECT #result('COUNT($NEEDDISTINCT T.APPEALID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM PA_APPEAL T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALDATE) T.APPEALDATE = #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($APPEALNUMBER) T.APPEALNUMBER = #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($APPEALOBJECTID) T.APPEALOBJECTID = #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CATEGORYID) T.CATEGORYID = #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRID) T.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATOREMAIL) T.INITIATOREMAIL = #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORID) T.INITIATORID = #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATORNAME) T.INITIATORNAME = #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORPHONE) T.INITIATORPHONE = #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORSURNAME) T.INITIATORSURNAME = #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORTYPEID) T.INITIATORTYPEID = #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($SOURCEID) T.SOURCEID = #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSNAME) T.STATUSNAME = #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) T.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaAppealInsert
query.sql: INSERT INTO PA_APPEAL ( APPEALDATE, APPEALID, APPEALNUMBER, APPEALOBJECTID, CATEGORYID, CONTRID, INITIATOREMAIL, INITIATORID, INITIATORNAME, INITIATORPHONE, INITIATORSURNAME, INITIATORTYPEID, SOURCEID, STATUSNAME, STATUSSYSNAME $ASPECTFIELDS ) VALUES ( #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT'), #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR'), #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR'), #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') $ASPECTVALUESBINDINGS )

INSERT INTO PA_APPEAL ( APPEALDATE, APPEALID, APPEALNUMBER, APPEALOBJECTID, CATEGORYID, CONTRID, INITIATOREMAIL, INITIATORID, INITIATORNAME, INITIATORPHONE, INITIATORSURNAME, INITIATORTYPEID, SOURCEID, STATUSNAME, STATUSSYSNAME $ASPECTFIELDS ) VALUES ( #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT'), #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR'), #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR'), #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') $ASPECTVALUESBINDINGS )

INSERT INTO PA_APPEAL ( APPEALDATE, APPEALID, APPEALNUMBER, APPEALOBJECTID, CATEGORYID, CONTRID, INITIATOREMAIL, INITIATORID, INITIATORNAME, INITIATORPHONE, INITIATORSURNAME, INITIATORTYPEID, SOURCEID, STATUSNAME, STATUSSYSNAME $ASPECTFIELDS ) VALUES ( #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT'), #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR'), #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR'), #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR'), #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') $ASPECTVALUESBINDINGS )

query.name: dsPaAppealUpdate
query.sql:
UPDATE T SET T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALDATE) , T.APPEALDATE = #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($APPEALNUMBER) , T.APPEALNUMBER = #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($APPEALOBJECTID) , T.APPEALOBJECTID = #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CATEGORYID) , T.CATEGORYID = #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRID) , T.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATOREMAIL) , T.INITIATOREMAIL = #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORID) , T.INITIATORID = #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATORNAME) , T.INITIATORNAME = #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORPHONE) , T.INITIATORPHONE = #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORSURNAME) , T.INITIATORSURNAME = #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORTYPEID) , T.INITIATORTYPEID = #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($SOURCEID) , T.SOURCEID = #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSNAME) , T.STATUSNAME = #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , T.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_APPEAL T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

UPDATE T SET T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALDATE) , T.APPEALDATE = #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($APPEALNUMBER) , T.APPEALNUMBER = #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($APPEALOBJECTID) , T.APPEALOBJECTID = #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CATEGORYID) , T.CATEGORYID = #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRID) , T.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATOREMAIL) , T.INITIATOREMAIL = #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORID) , T.INITIATORID = #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATORNAME) , T.INITIATORNAME = #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORPHONE) , T.INITIATORPHONE = #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORSURNAME) , T.INITIATORSURNAME = #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORTYPEID) , T.INITIATORTYPEID = #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($SOURCEID) , T.SOURCEID = #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSNAME) , T.STATUSNAME = #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , T.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_APPEAL T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

UPDATE PA_APPEAL T SET T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALDATE) , T.APPEALDATE = #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($APPEALNUMBER) , T.APPEALNUMBER = #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($APPEALOBJECTID) , T.APPEALOBJECTID = #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CATEGORYID) , T.CATEGORYID = #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRID) , T.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATOREMAIL) , T.INITIATOREMAIL = #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORID) , T.INITIATORID = #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATORNAME) , T.INITIATORNAME = #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORPHONE) , T.INITIATORPHONE = #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORSURNAME) , T.INITIATORSURNAME = #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORTYPEID) , T.INITIATORTYPEID = #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($SOURCEID) , T.SOURCEID = #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSNAME) , T.STATUSNAME = #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , T.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaAppealUpdateTA
query.sql:
UPDATE TA SET TA.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALDATE) , TA.APPEALDATE = #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($APPEALNUMBER) , TA.APPEALNUMBER = #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($APPEALOBJECTID) , TA.APPEALOBJECTID = #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CATEGORYID) , TA.CATEGORYID = #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRID) , TA.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATOREMAIL) , TA.INITIATOREMAIL = #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORID) , TA.INITIATORID = #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATORNAME) , TA.INITIATORNAME = #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORPHONE) , TA.INITIATORPHONE = #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORSURNAME) , TA.INITIATORSURNAME = #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORTYPEID) , TA.INITIATORTYPEID = #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($SOURCEID) , TA.SOURCEID = #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSNAME) , TA.STATUSNAME = #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , TA.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_APPEAL TA WHERE TA.APPEALID in ( SELECT T.APPEALID FROM PA_APPEAL T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )

UPDATE TA SET TA.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALDATE) , TA.APPEALDATE = #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($APPEALNUMBER) , TA.APPEALNUMBER = #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($APPEALOBJECTID) , TA.APPEALOBJECTID = #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CATEGORYID) , TA.CATEGORYID = #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRID) , TA.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATOREMAIL) , TA.INITIATOREMAIL = #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORID) , TA.INITIATORID = #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATORNAME) , TA.INITIATORNAME = #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORPHONE) , TA.INITIATORPHONE = #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORSURNAME) , TA.INITIATORSURNAME = #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORTYPEID) , TA.INITIATORTYPEID = #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($SOURCEID) , TA.SOURCEID = #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSNAME) , TA.STATUSNAME = #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , TA.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_APPEAL TA WHERE TA.APPEALID in ( SELECT T.APPEALID FROM PA_APPEAL T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )

UPDATE PA_APPEAL TA SET TA.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALDATE) , TA.APPEALDATE = #bind($APPEALDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($APPEALNUMBER) , TA.APPEALNUMBER = #bind($APPEALNUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($APPEALOBJECTID) , TA.APPEALOBJECTID = #bind($APPEALOBJECTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CATEGORYID) , TA.CATEGORYID = #bind($CATEGORYID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRID) , TA.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATOREMAIL) , TA.INITIATOREMAIL = #bind($INITIATOREMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORID) , TA.INITIATORID = #bind($INITIATORID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($INITIATORNAME) , TA.INITIATORNAME = #bind($INITIATORNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORPHONE) , TA.INITIATORPHONE = #bind($INITIATORPHONE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORSURNAME) , TA.INITIATORSURNAME = #bind($INITIATORSURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($INITIATORTYPEID) , TA.INITIATORTYPEID = #bind($INITIATORTYPEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($SOURCEID) , TA.SOURCEID = #bind($SOURCEID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSNAME) , TA.STATUSNAME = #bind($STATUSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , TA.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS WHERE TA.APPEALID in ( SELECT T.APPEALID FROM PA_APPEAL T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )

query.name: dsPaAppealDelete
query.sql: DELETE T FROM PA_APPEAL T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end
DELETE T FROM PA_APPEAL T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end
DELETE PA_APPEAL T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaAppealDeleteTA
query.sql: DELETE TA FROM PA_APPEAL TA WHERE TA.APPEALID in ( SELECT T.APPEALID FROM PA_APPEAL T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )

DELETE TA FROM PA_APPEAL TA WHERE TA.APPEALID in ( SELECT T.APPEALID FROM PA_APPEAL T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )

DELETE PA_APPEAL TA WHERE TA.APPEALID in ( SELECT T.APPEALID FROM PA_APPEAL T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )

query.name: dsPaAppealHistBrowseListByParam
query.sql: SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.APPEALID', 'java.lang.Long', 'APPEALID'), #result('T.APPEALHISTID', 'java.lang.Long', 'APPEALHISTID'), #result('T.ISFAVORITE', 'java.lang.Long', 'ISFAVORITE'), #result('T.ISUNREADED', 'java.lang.Long', 'ISUNREADED'), #result('T.MESSAGEDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'MESSAGEDATE'), #result('T.MESSAGETEXT', 'java.lang.String', 'MESSAGETEXT'), #result('T.USERACCOUNTID', 'java.lang.Long', 'USERACCOUNTID') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_APPEALHIST T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALHISTID) T.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISFAVORITE) T.ISFAVORITE = #bind($ISFAVORITE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISUNREADED) T.ISUNREADED = #bind($ISUNREADED 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($MESSAGEDATE) T.MESSAGEDATE = #bind($MESSAGEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($MESSAGETEXT) T.MESSAGETEXT = #bind($MESSAGETEXT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($USERACCOUNTID) T.USERACCOUNTID = #bind($USERACCOUNTID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaAppealHistBrowseListByParamCount
query.sql: SELECT #result('COUNT($NEEDDISTINCT T.APPEALHISTID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM PA_APPEALHIST T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALHISTID) T.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($APPEALID) T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISFAVORITE) T.ISFAVORITE = #bind($ISFAVORITE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISUNREADED) T.ISUNREADED = #bind($ISUNREADED 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($MESSAGEDATE) T.MESSAGEDATE = #bind($MESSAGEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($MESSAGETEXT) T.MESSAGETEXT = #bind($MESSAGETEXT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($USERACCOUNTID) T.USERACCOUNTID = #bind($USERACCOUNTID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaAppealHistInsert
query.sql: INSERT INTO PA_APPEALHIST ( APPEALHISTID, APPEALID, ISFAVORITE, ISUNREADED, MESSAGEDATE, MESSAGETEXT, USERACCOUNTID $ASPECTFIELDS ) VALUES ( #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($ISFAVORITE 'NUMERIC'), #bind($ISUNREADED 'NUMERIC'), #bind($MESSAGEDATE 'FLOAT'), #bind($MESSAGETEXT 'VARCHAR'), #bind($USERACCOUNTID 'NUMERIC') $ASPECTVALUESBINDINGS )

INSERT INTO PA_APPEALHIST ( APPEALHISTID, APPEALID, ISFAVORITE, ISUNREADED, MESSAGEDATE, MESSAGETEXT, USERACCOUNTID $ASPECTFIELDS ) VALUES ( #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($ISFAVORITE 'NUMERIC'), #bind($ISUNREADED 'NUMERIC'), #bind($MESSAGEDATE 'FLOAT'), #bind($MESSAGETEXT 'VARCHAR'), #bind($USERACCOUNTID 'NUMERIC') $ASPECTVALUESBINDINGS )

INSERT INTO PA_APPEALHIST ( APPEALHISTID, APPEALID, ISFAVORITE, ISUNREADED, MESSAGEDATE, MESSAGETEXT, USERACCOUNTID $ASPECTFIELDS ) VALUES ( #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC'), #bind($ISFAVORITE 'NUMERIC'), #bind($ISUNREADED 'NUMERIC'), #bind($MESSAGEDATE 'FLOAT'), #bind($MESSAGETEXT 'VARCHAR'), #bind($USERACCOUNTID 'NUMERIC') $ASPECTVALUESBINDINGS )

query.name: dsPaAppealHistUpdate
query.sql:
UPDATE T SET T.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALID) , T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISFAVORITE) , T.ISFAVORITE = #bind($ISFAVORITE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISUNREADED) , T.ISUNREADED = #bind($ISUNREADED 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($MESSAGEDATE) , T.MESSAGEDATE = #bind($MESSAGEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($MESSAGETEXT) , T.MESSAGETEXT = #bind($MESSAGETEXT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($USERACCOUNTID) , T.USERACCOUNTID = #bind($USERACCOUNTID 'NUMERIC') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_APPEALHIST T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALHISTID) T.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

UPDATE T SET T.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALID) , T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISFAVORITE) , T.ISFAVORITE = #bind($ISFAVORITE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISUNREADED) , T.ISUNREADED = #bind($ISUNREADED 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($MESSAGEDATE) , T.MESSAGEDATE = #bind($MESSAGEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($MESSAGETEXT) , T.MESSAGETEXT = #bind($MESSAGETEXT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($USERACCOUNTID) , T.USERACCOUNTID = #bind($USERACCOUNTID 'NUMERIC') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_APPEALHIST T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALHISTID) T.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

UPDATE PA_APPEALHIST T SET T.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALID) , T.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISFAVORITE) , T.ISFAVORITE = #bind($ISFAVORITE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISUNREADED) , T.ISUNREADED = #bind($ISUNREADED 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($MESSAGEDATE) , T.MESSAGEDATE = #bind($MESSAGEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($MESSAGETEXT) , T.MESSAGETEXT = #bind($MESSAGETEXT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($USERACCOUNTID) , T.USERACCOUNTID = #bind($USERACCOUNTID 'NUMERIC') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALHISTID) T.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaAppealHistUpdateTA
query.sql:
UPDATE TA SET TA.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALID) , TA.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISFAVORITE) , TA.ISFAVORITE = #bind($ISFAVORITE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISUNREADED) , TA.ISUNREADED = #bind($ISUNREADED 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($MESSAGEDATE) , TA.MESSAGEDATE = #bind($MESSAGEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($MESSAGETEXT) , TA.MESSAGETEXT = #bind($MESSAGETEXT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($USERACCOUNTID) , TA.USERACCOUNTID = #bind($USERACCOUNTID 'NUMERIC') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_APPEALHIST TA WHERE TA.APPEALHISTID in ( SELECT T.APPEALHISTID FROM PA_APPEALHIST T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($APPEALHISTID) T.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )

UPDATE TA SET TA.APPEALHISTID = #bind($APPEALHISTID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($APPEALID) , TA.APPEALID = #bind($APPEALID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISFAVORITE) , TA.ISFAVORITE = #bind($ISFAVORITE 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($ISUNREADED) , TA.ISUNREADED = #bind($ISUNREADED 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($MESSAGEDATE) , TA.MESSAGEDATE = #bind($MESSAGEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($MESSAGETEXT) , TA.MESSAGETEXT = #bind($MESSAGETEXT 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($USERACCOUNTID) , TA.USERACCOUNTID = #bind($USERACCOUNTID 'NUMERIC') #end

query.name: dsPaContractBrowseListByParam
query.sql: SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.CONTRID', 'java.lang.Long', 'CONTRID'), #result('T.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'NAME'), #result('T.PAOBJECTID', 'java.lang.Long', 'PAOBJECTID'), #result('T.PAUSERID', 'java.lang.Long', 'PAUSERID'), #result('T.RELIABILITYLEVEL', 'java.lang.Long', 'RELIABILITYLEVEL') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_CONTRACT T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CONTRID) T.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAME) T.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PAOBJECTID) T.PAOBJECTID = #bind($PAOBJECTID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($PAUSERID) T.PAUSERID = #bind($PAUSERID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($RELIABILITYLEVEL) T.RELIABILITYLEVEL = #bind($RELIABILITYLEVEL 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaUserBrowseListByParam
query.sql: SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.EMAIL', 'java.lang.String', 'EMAIL'), #result('T.GROUPID', 'java.lang.Long', 'GROUPID'), #result('T.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'NAME'), #result('T.PHONENUMBER', 'java.lang.String', 'PHONENUMBER'), #result('T.SMSCODE', 'java.lang.String', 'SMSCODE'), #result('T.SMSCODEDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'SMSCODEDATE'), #result('T.STATUSDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal', 'STATUSDATE'), #result('T.STATUSID', 'java.lang.Long', 'STATUSID'), #result('T.STATUSSYSNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'STATUSSYSNAME'), #result('T.SURNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'SURNAME'), #result('T.USERID', 'java.lang.Long', 'USERID') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_USER T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($EMAIL) T.EMAIL = #bind($EMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($GROUPID) T.GROUPID = #bind($GROUPID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAME) T.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PHONENUMBER) T.PHONENUMBER = #bind($PHONENUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODE) T.SMSCODE = #bind($SMSCODE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODEDATE) T.SMSCODEDATE = #bind($SMSCODEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSDATE) T.STATUSDATE = #bind($STATUSDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSID) T.STATUSID = #bind($STATUSID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) T.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SURNAME) T.SURNAME = #bind($SURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaUserUpdate
query.sql:
UPDATE T SET T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($EMAIL) , T.EMAIL = #bind($EMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($GROUPID) , T.GROUPID = #bind($GROUPID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAME) , T.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PHONENUMBER) , T.PHONENUMBER = #bind($PHONENUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODE) , T.SMSCODE = #bind($SMSCODE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODEDATE) , T.SMSCODEDATE = #bind($SMSCODEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSDATE) , T.STATUSDATE = #bind($STATUSDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSID) , T.STATUSID = #bind($STATUSID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , T.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SURNAME) , T.SURNAME = #bind($SURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_USER T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_USER T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

UPDATE PA_USER T SET T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($EMAIL) , T.EMAIL = #bind($EMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($GROUPID) , T.GROUPID = #bind($GROUPID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAME) , T.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PHONENUMBER) , T.PHONENUMBER = #bind($PHONENUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODE) , T.SMSCODE = #bind($SMSCODE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODEDATE) , T.SMSCODEDATE = #bind($SMSCODEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSDATE) , T.STATUSDATE = #bind($STATUSDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSID) , T.STATUSID = #bind($STATUSID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , T.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SURNAME) , T.SURNAME = #bind($SURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaUserUpdateTA
query.sql:
UPDATE TA SET TA.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($EMAIL) , TA.EMAIL = #bind($EMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($GROUPID) , TA.GROUPID = #bind($GROUPID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAME) , TA.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PHONENUMBER) , TA.PHONENUMBER = #bind($PHONENUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODE) , TA.SMSCODE = #bind($SMSCODE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODEDATE) , TA.SMSCODEDATE = #bind($SMSCODEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSDATE) , TA.STATUSDATE = #bind($STATUSDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSID) , TA.STATUSID = #bind($STATUSID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , TA.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SURNAME) , TA.SURNAME = #bind($SURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_USER TA WHERE TA.USERID in ( SELECT T.USERID FROM PA_USER T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )

UPDATE TA SET TA.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($EMAIL) , TA.EMAIL = #bind($EMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($GROUPID) , TA.GROUPID = #bind($GROUPID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAME) , TA.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PHONENUMBER) , TA.PHONENUMBER = #bind($PHONENUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODE) , TA.SMSCODE = #bind($SMSCODE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODEDATE) , TA.SMSCODEDATE = #bind($SMSCODEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSDATE) , TA.STATUSDATE = #bind($STATUSDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSID) , TA.STATUSID = #bind($STATUSID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , TA.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SURNAME) , TA.SURNAME = #bind($SURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM PA_USER TA WHERE TA.USERID in ( SELECT T.USERID FROM PA_USER T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )

UPDATE PA_USER TA SET TA.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #chunk($EMAIL) , TA.EMAIL = #bind($EMAIL 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($GROUPID) , TA.GROUPID = #bind($GROUPID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($NAME) , TA.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PHONENUMBER) , TA.PHONENUMBER = #bind($PHONENUMBER 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODE) , TA.SMSCODE = #bind($SMSCODE 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SMSCODEDATE) , TA.SMSCODEDATE = #bind($SMSCODEDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSDATE) , TA.STATUSDATE = #bind($STATUSDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATUSID) , TA.STATUSID = #bind($STATUSID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($STATUSSYSNAME) , TA.STATUSSYSNAME = #bind($STATUSSYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SURNAME) , TA.SURNAME = #bind($SURNAME 'VARCHAR') #end
$ASPECTFIELDS WHERE TA.USERID in ( SELECT T.USERID FROM PA_USER T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )

query.name: dsPaUserDelete
query.sql: DELETE T FROM PA_USER T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end
DELETE T FROM PA_USER T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end
DELETE PA_USER T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsPaUserDeleteTA
query.sql: DELETE TA FROM PA_USER TA WHERE TA.USERID in ( SELECT T.USERID FROM PA_USER T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )
DELETE TA FROM PA_USER TA WHERE TA.USERID in ( SELECT T.USERID FROM PA_USER T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )
DELETE PA_USER TA WHERE TA.USERID in ( SELECT T.USERID FROM PA_USER T $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($USERID) T.USERID = #bind($USERID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end )
